definition: to make a circuit/to circle/circle/circumference/lap/cycle/complete/all/all over/thorough/to help financially

sentences.english: No cases have been reported outside Uige for the past five weeks.
sentences.chinese: 在过去5周内在威热省之外未报告发生病例。

sentences.english: Finding should change standard of care, which is 4 doses every 3 weeks, researchers say.
sentences.chinese: 研究员说该发现将改变每3周4次给药的治疗标准。

sentences.english: On the whole, average weekly hours are far below their pre-recession level.
sentences.chinese: 整体而言，周平均工作时间比起衰退前大幅下滑。

sentences.english: Methods 37 cases of in-patients with schizophrenia were treated with Quetiatine for 8 weeks.
sentences.chinese: 方法对37例精神分裂症住院病人用奎的平治疗8周。

sentences.english: Tung Suet plays Bach's minuet at home.
sentences.chinese: 周冬雪在家演奏小步舞曲。

sentences.english: Nearly 3 weeks of continuous heavy rains and floods in eastern Australia, calamity-ridden.
sentences.chinese: 连续近3周的暴雨和洪水使澳大利亚东部灾难深重。

sentences.english: Good morning, boys and girls. Nice to see you. I am Mrs Zhou .
sentences.chinese: 同学们早上好，我是周老师，见到你们很高兴。

sentences.english: In 771 B. C, the capital was moved eastward to Luoyang in present-day Henan Province.
sentences.chinese: 公元前771年，周的首都东迁到了现河南省的洛阳。

sentences.english: Provides a weekly report of any plant or equipment witch is Out Of Order and the action taken.
sentences.chinese: 提供发生故障的机房或设备的周报告以及采取的行动。

sentences.english: Ms. Zhou Yali, Assistant Manager, Wuhan Arts and Crafts Industry Company.
sentences.chinese: 周雅丽女士，武汉工艺美术工业公司助理经理。

sentences.english: When Chou Chin heard Chin You-yu telling his sad story, he cried even harder.
sentences.chinese: 周进见姊夫说中他的心事，越发号啕大哭。

sentences.english: Let me see. She has 30 minutes on Tuesday afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 让我查查，她周两下战书有30分钟。

sentences.english: In the second group Benidipine, Hydrochloride was used for 6 weeks.
sentences.chinese: 各小组分别用生理盐水或盐酸贝尼地平灌胃6周。

sentences.english: Copies of both notes were obtained by The Associated Press on Monday.
sentences.chinese: 所有备忘录的副本被美联社于周一时得到。

sentences.english: Antenatal diagnosis is usually made after 22 weeks of gestation.
sentences.chinese: 通常在产前检查时发现此肿瘤约为怀孕22周以后。

definition: one week/all the way around/a whole cycle
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
(classical) a type of battle-ax/to kill/to slaughter
Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
